name: Solar System (itch) (Carles20vt)
description:
This is my Coursera Solar System project. 

I added the following elements:

  • Mercury
  • Venus
  • Earth (and moon)
  • Mars (and two moons)
  • Jupiter (and four moons)
  • Saturn (and one moon)
  • Uranus
  • Neptune
  • Pluto
  • Comet


Credits:
Carles Arasil
